actions.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

official_title: A bill to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2404 Race Street, Jonesboro, Arkansas, as the "Hattie W. Caraway Post Office".

summary.text: Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2404 Race Street, Jonesboro, Arkansas, as the "Hattie W. Caraway Post Office."
